verbs.description: skill 1 of communication in marriage for communication to [V: work] [ARGM-LOC: in any relationship] both members must abide by certain rules there is a right and wrong way to communicate with each other and over the years it has become clear to me that while healthy communication can strengthen a marriage poor communication can destroy it one of the top karen marriage communication
